title: Init (Method)
text:
METHOD Init : BOOL
Init method used for using an already existing memory for storing the string

rows.Name: pBuffer
rows.Comment: The pointer to the buffer containing the string

rows:
The size of the buffer (in bytes), where the string is stored.
If this value is 0, no memory is allocated and the CharBufferPtr pointer
has to be set by calling the Initialize method
A __SYSTEM.TYPE_CLASS value indicating type of the string
